name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M2 Pro chip, 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 16GB unified memory, 512GB SSD storage. Perfect for professional work and creative tasks.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: Ultra-thin and light laptop with Intel 12th Gen processors, 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, premium build quality.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, advanced camera system with 3x telephoto lens, and USB-C connectivity.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Premium Android smartphone with S Pen, 200MP camera, 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, and advanced AI features.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and multipoint connection.

name: AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
description: Apple AirPods Pro with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, spatial audio, and MagSafe charging case.

name: iPad Air 5th Generation
description: 10.9-inch iPad Air with M1 chip, stunning colors, ultrafast Wi-Fi 6, and compatibility with Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: 2-in-1 laptop tablet with 12th Gen Intel Core processors, 13-inch PixelSense touchscreen, and all-day battery life.

name: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
description: A must-read book for software developers by Robert C. Martin. Learn principles and best practices for writing clean, maintainable code.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: Your Journey to Mastery by David Thomas and Andrew Hunt. Essential reading for programmers who want to improve their craft.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Nintendo Switch console with vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, wide adjustable stand, and 64GB internal storage.

name: PlayStation 5
description: Sony PlayStation 5 console with ultra-high speed SSD, haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio technology.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches, programmable keys, and durable aluminum construction.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and 25,600 DPI sensor.

name: 4K Monitor 27-inch
description: Ultra-sharp 4K UHD monitor with IPS panel, HDR support, USB-C connectivity, and height-adjustable stand.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Premium ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable armrests, breathable mesh back, and 10-year warranty.

name: Standing Desk Converter
description: Height-adjustable standing desk converter that transforms any desk into a sit-stand workstation. Supports dual monitors.

name: Coffee Machine Espresso
description: Professional-grade espresso machine with built-in grinder, milk frother, and programmable settings for perfect coffee.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Smart robot vacuum with laser navigation, app control, automatic dirt disposal, and pet hair specialization.

name: Bluetooth Speaker Portable
description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, 24-hour battery life, and party mode connectivity.
